verbs.description: [ARG1: astros fans] [V: wait] [ARGM-LOC: in nervous anticipation] [ARGM-ADV: hoping for another win to stay alive astros fans arrived at minute maid park thursday at the precipice after the astros heartbreaking loss to the boston red sox wednesday they were on the edge one game from elimination had the luck the skill and relentless drive that fueled their 2017 championship season run out on thursday the astros and their fans entered minute maid park hoping that it had not and that the team could make good on its last chance to keep their post - season dreams alive to take the fight to the red sox at fenway park we got a game stolen from us yesterday] said cameron cruz 23 walking toward minute maid thursday afternoon in a jersey and sporting a replica 2017 world series champions ring donna catlett jose altuve houston to stay alive john geiss mark lancaster joe west houston astros minute maid park debra fenway park minute maid kira boston red sox carlos ovies caleb astros cleveland indians justin verlander debra catlett john dettor mookie betts montrose hometeam cameron cruz 2004 world series american league jackson alford
